issue.title: [R] Support Tables in Flight
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10416](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10416). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When I wrote the flight POC bindings in the arrow package, the Python/reticulate interface didn't support Tables/ChunkedArrays yet, so it forced everything to work with RecordBatches only.
